en.bdb: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor
One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor

verse.gurmukhi: pihlw gurmuiK jnmu lY BY ivic vrqY hoie ieAwxw[
verse.unicode: ਪਹਿਲਾ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਜਨਮੁ ਲੈ ਭੈ ਵਿਚਿ ਵਰਤੈ ਹੋਇ ਇਆਣਾ।

en.bdb: Having been born in this world, the gurmukh becoming innocent and ignorant ducts himself in the fear of the Lord.

transliteration.english: pahilaa gurmukh janam lai bhai vich varatai hoi iaanaa|
transliteration.hindi: पहिला गुरमुखि जनमु लै भै विचि वरतै होइ इआणा।
transliteration.en: pahilaa gurmukh janam lai bhai vich varatai hoi iaanaa|
transliteration.hi: पहिला गुरमुखि जनमु लै भै विचि वरतै होइ इआणा।
transliteration.ipa: pəhɪlɑ Gʊrəmʊkʰ d͡ʒənəm læ ɓæ ʋɪt͡ʃ ʋərət̪æ hɔeɪ ɪɑɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: پهِلا گُرمکھ جنم لَے بھَے وچ ورتَے هوا ایاݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: gur isK lY gurisKu hoie Bwie Bgiq ivic Krw isAwxw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖ ਲੈ ਗੁਰਸਿਖੁ ਹੋਇ ਭਾਇ ਭਗਤਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਖਰਾ ਸਿਆਣਾ।

en.bdb: Adopting the teaching of the Guru becomes the Sikh of the Guru and sustaining himself in the loving devotion, e leads a pure and intelligent life.

transliteration.english: gur sikh lai gursikh hoi bhai bhagat vich kharaa siaanaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुर सिख लै गुरसिखु होइ भाइ भगति विचि खरा सिआणा।
transliteration.en: gur sikh lai gursikh hoi bhai bhagat vich kharaa siaanaa|
transliteration.hi: गुर सिख लै गुरसिखु होइ भाइ भगति विचि खरा सिआणा।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr sɪkʰ læ Gʊrəsɪkʰ hɔeɪ ɓɑeɪ ɓəGət̪ ʋɪt͡ʃ kʰərɑ sɪəɑɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُر سکھ لَے گُرسکھ هوا بھاا بھگت وچ کھرا سآݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurisK suix mMnY smiJ mwx mhiq ivic rhY inmwxw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਸੁਣਿ ਮੰਨੈ ਸਮਝਿ ਮਾਣ ਮਹਤਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਰਹੈ ਨਿਮਾਣਾ।

en.bdb: After listening to and understanding it, e accepts the teachings of the Guru and even earning the glories continues be humble.

transliteration.english: gursikh sun ma(n)nai samajh maan mahat vich rahai nimaanaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरसिख सुणि मंनै समझि माण महति विचि रहै निमाणा।
transliteration.en: gursikh sun ma(n)nai samajh maan mahat vich rahai nimaanaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरसिख सुणि मंनै समझि माण महति विचि रहै निमाणा।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəsɪkʰ sʊɳ məŋnæ səməɖ͡ʐ mɑɳ məhət̪ ʋɪt͡ʃ rəhæ nɪmɑɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرسکھ سُݨ منَّے سمجھ ماݨ مهت وچِ رهَے نماݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: gur isK gurisKu pUjdw pYrI pY rihrws luBwxw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖ ਗੁਰਸਿਖੁ ਪੂਜਦਾ ਪੈਰੀ ਪੈ ਰਹਿਰਾਸ ਲੁਭਾਣਾ।

en.bdb: In accordance with the teachings of the Guru, he worships the e Sikhs and touching their feet and, following their virtus path, he becomes avourite of all.

transliteration.english: gur sikh gursikh poojadhaa pairee pai rahiraas lubhaanaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुर सिख गुरसिखु पूजदा पैरी पै रहिरास लुभाणा।
transliteration.en: gur sikh gursikh poojadhaa pairee pai rahiraas lubhaanaa|
transliteration.hi: गुर सिख गुरसिखु पूजदा पैरी पै रहिरास लुभाणा।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr sɪkʰ Gʊrəsɪkʰ pud͡ʒəd̪ɑ pæri pæ rəhɪrɑs lʊɓɑɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُر سکھ گُرسکھ پُوجدا پَےریِ پَے رهِراس لُبھاݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: gur isK mnhu n ivsrY clxu jwix jugiq imhmwxw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰ ਸਿਖ ਮਨਹੁ ਨ ਵਿਸਰੈ ਚਲਣੁ ਜਾਣਿ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਮਿਹਮਾਣਾ।

en.bdb: Guru's instruction is never forgotten by the Sikh and he having learnt the way of considering himself as a passing guest, spends his life (purposefully) here.

transliteration.english: gur sikh manahu na visarai chalan jaan jugat mihamaanaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुर सिख मनहु न विसरै चलणु जाणि जुगति मिहमाणा।
transliteration.en: gur sikh manahu na visarai chalan jaan jugat mihamaanaa|
transliteration.hi: गुर सिख मनहु न विसरै चलणु जाणि जुगति मिहमाणा।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊr sɪkʰ mənəh nə ʋɪsəræ t͡ʃələɳ d͡ʒɑɳ d͡ʒʊGət̪ mɪhəmɑɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُر سکھ منهُ ن وسرَے چلݨ جاݨ جُگت مهماݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurisK imTw bolxw iniv clxw gurisKu prvwxw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਸਿਖ ਮਿਠਾ ਬੋਲਣਾ ਨਿਵਿ ਚਲਣਾ ਗੁਰਸਿਖੁ ਪਰਵਾਣਾ।

en.bdb: The Sikh of the Guru speaks sweetly and accept  humility as the proper way of life.

transliteration.english: gursikh miThaa bolanaa niv chalanaa gursikh paravaanaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरसिख मिठा बोलणा निवि चलणा गुरसिखु परवाणा।
transliteration.en: gursikh miThaa bolanaa niv chalanaa gursikh paravaanaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरसिख मिठा बोलणा निवि चलणा गुरसिखु परवाणा।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəsɪkʰ mɪʈʰɑ bɔləɳɑ nɪʋ t͡ʃələɳɑ Gʊrəsɪkʰ pərəʋɑɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرسکھ مٹھا بولݨا نو چلݨا گُرسکھ پرواݨا۔

en.bdb: The Gurmukh, guru-oriented person earns is livelihood by hard labour and shares his victuals with other Sikhs of the um.
